Text:
I feel I should say something.  This book isn't very good, and, while it sort of wraps up a few loose threads from the first game, has almost nothing at all to do with the second.

I can only recommend this for people who really, really love inFamous, because it will make anyone else hate it.

LOL, love your review XP :D

Wish more people used the comments for well thought out reviews instead of flame wars.
Thank you MM you're a service to the Bay
